name: Re:Pair
description:
Pair up the eggs with the nests! Then re-pair the chickens with the bird houses.

Red bird (left) controls:

  • A, D - Move
  • W - Jump
  • S (hold) - Hatch
  • Space - Throw

Blue bird (right) controls:

  • Left, Right - Move
  • Up - Jump
  • Down (hold) - Hatch
  • Right Ctrl - Throw

Remember that the bird color doesn't matter. You can bring chickens to any bird house, but bringing them to the correctly colored one will give extra points.
There is no pause. Alt+F4 to exit.

The fifth in a series of games made for Southampton Game Jam by team Zepler Studios

  • Bogdan Stoicescu
  • Teodor Nistor
  • Iarina Dafin
  • Cristian Niculae
  • Sebastian Gherhes
